docs.title: 🗺️ Mindmap Export
docs.text: Format: .mmd (Mermaid format) Purpose: Structured visual representation of paper concepts

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Native Mermaid syntax
  • Fully editable

docs.title: ⚡ Why Separate Exports?
docs.text:
Output Best For Summary.txt Reading & academic writing Mindmap.mmd Visualization & structured understanding

!!! tip Download both files for maximum productivity — read the summary and visualize the structure.

docs.title: 🔑 Do I need an API key?
docs.text:
No API key is required from end users.

The application securely uses a Google Gemini API key stored in the server environment (st.secrets). Users do not need to configure anything.

docs.title: 🗺️ What roadmap format gets exported?
docs.text:
The roadmap is exported as:

.mmd — Mermaid flowchart format

Compatible with:

  • ✅ Mermaid Live Editor (mermaid.live)
  • ✅ GitHub Markdown
  • ✅ VS Code Mermaid preview
  • ✅ Documentation systems
  • ✅ Obsidian

docs.title: 📄 What file formats are supported?
docs.text:
You can upload:

  • .pdf
  • .docx
  • .txt
  • .py
  • .js
  • .md

docs.title: 📦 Are there file size limits?
docs.text:
File size limits are determined by Streamlit Cloud hosting constraints.

If deploying privately, limits depend on your server configuration.

docs.title: 💰 Is it free to use?
docs.text:
Yes — the hosted version is free to access.

No signup required. No user API key required.

docs.title: ⏱️ How fast is processing?
docs.text:
Typical processing times:

Input Type Estimated Time Short text < 1 second PDF (10 pages) ~2 seconds DOCX (20 pages) ~2–3 seconds Roadmap generation 1–3 seconds

Actual speed depends on document length and AI response time.

docs.title: 🛠️ Can I deploy it myself?
docs.text:
Yes.

  1. Clone the repository
  2. Install dependencies
  3. Set your GOOGLE_API_KEY
  4. Run:

streamlit run app4.py
